name: Preservation
flavorText: Wizards use this spell to keep their tomes from mold and other dangers. Explorers wish the wizards would do the same for trail rations.
text: You enchant a quantity of nonliving organic material so that it resists all natural deterioration. Rot, mold, consuming vermin, and the like all leave the enchanted material alone. Damage intentionally done can still harm the material.  Your Arcana or Nature check determines how much material you can affect with one ritual casting.
